service.name: DataAccessSample
service.title: Data Access Sample
service.description: A sample to access key attributes of the Data file as an XML.

operation.name: centralDataAccess
operation.hint: Extract the ^field, ^global, ^form, and ^job commands from the field-nominated data files and renders them as XML.

output-parameter.name: outXMLDoc
output-parameter.title: Output XML
output-parameter.hint: Well-formed XML file that represent the generated content. Type: document.

input-parameter.name: inDataDoc
input-parameter.title: Data File
input-parameter.hint: Field-nominated data file (*.dat) to be processed. Type: document.

input-parameter.name: inMaxBytesToProcess
input-parameter.title: Bytes To Be Processed
input-parameter.hint: Maximum bytes to be processed from the data file. Type: int. Default value: 100000 bytes.
